Reviews.Title: Sollid laptop
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: After you uninstall the bloatware and stop a few startup programs in msconfig the laptop is perfect for everyday use. The screen is amazing and the touchscreen is very responsive.

Reviews.Title: soaked in water and still works!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: great screen, nice slim design, i had a glass of water beside my vaio and my cat knocked it over... the water went all over the keyboard. i immediately turned it off and used dry tissue to soak up what i could. i let it sit upside down for 2 hours and water was still slowly dripping out of the keys, and it still works like new! I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Title: battery life not good
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Like the features of the laptop (this is my first) but the battery life really sucks only seem to get a couple of hours on it.  Not a good choice if you travel a lot and depend on the battery lasting for you flight

Reviews.Title: Defective battery, it won't work from the very first time you open the box
Reviews.Author: Diego "DXA"
Reviews.Content: I really had a bad experience with this product or I was the lucky one to receive a brand new laptop with a defective battery. I spent a good time researching why my laptop battery wouldn't charge I even contacted Sony for support in hope that it's not a hardware related issue but they affirmed it's the battery and it should be under warranty. I went ahead and placed a second order in Amazon (same laptop, model, color etc). When I received my second laptop guess what? it had the same exact issue.It's probable that there are more VAIO svf15215cxw laptops in stock with this issue, I can't be the only one who received 2 brand new laptops with defective batteries.I'm sorry SONY but I already spent too much time dealing with the same issue twice.

Reviews.Title: Worst product ever!
Reviews.Author: bobbi Collins
Reviews.Content: Buyer beware! Purchased this product for my daughter. It worked for a month. Sent it in for service twice. No resolutions! Spoke to 9 customer service reps. They have sent me to yet another department. Worst $800.00 I have ever spent!! I will never buy a product from Sony again based on the customer service I received. It's sad when a company sees you as a number and not a person. Even sadder, when the product is of poor quality with a high price tag.

Reviews.Title: Not good enough
Reviews.Author: Willy Lam Ho
Reviews.Content: Bought a new one replacing my old vaio vgn series.  This hard drive is really slow,but plenty, Core i5, doesnt really work, I have the same Core i5 on a desktop and works flowlessly and twice faster.  Touchpad its simply a nighmare only a small area is good for mouse work, the rest gets really confusing.  Sensitivity its another nightmare sometimes you touch, nothing happens end up very anoyed (20 percent of the times), you will end up with a mouse.Design wise, its beatifull, flip and touchscreen are great, however a few hours later the edges will start hurting your lap or hand.  Battery wise is good, I get 4 plus hours.  Screen colours are just great, thats why I put 1 star for the beauty and 1 for the screen, I'll think bettery next time.Vaio has let me down this time.

Reviews.Title: Didn't Last
Reviews.Author: Ona
Reviews.Content: Laptop is fast and slick with a nice touch screen, but the Windows 8 seriously blows goats and it comes with a Kaspersky trial that is a trap and just loads up a bunch of adware and spyware that you have to purge from your system to restore basic functionality.  I used it gently but a key broke after about 4 months (it's in my password,) and the thing is currently a pretty pink paperweight.

Reviews.Title: No complaints
Reviews.Author: Commerce "Patrick"
Reviews.Content: No complaints from the Daughter which makes me happy. Touch screen is a 7 or 8 out of 10. Not perfect but really not bad. I am not a Sony guy but I spent a lot of time doing research to find the best mix. I think I got it.

Reviews.Title: Don't like it
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to be a brand new laptop. I pulled it out of the box and it was illegally shipped with the battery already installed. When I recived it there were no Sony stickers on the bottom if it for product identification and no windows sticker with the serial number on it. I do believe I was over charged for a used laptop claiming to be new. I doubt I will buy any more computers from Amazon in the future, because this was not a new computer and was sold as a new one in the box.

Reviews.Title: This computer is awesome. I bought it on Amazon for $100 less then best buy.
Reviews.Author: This playstation unit went bad shortly after ...
Reviews.Content: Great computer. Looks awesome and works awesome. Plus got the square trade warentee so I saved about 4 hundred dollars instead of buying it from best buy

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-3337U
6 GB DDR3L SDRAM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.5-Inch Touch-Enabled Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Sony VAIO Fit Series SVF15215CXP 15.5-Inch Core i5 Touch Laptop
